data.name: Young Saver
data.description: Young Saver is a great way to start your childs  savings journey. Be rewarded with no monthly fees and the ability to earn bonus interest.

features.additionalValue: Use your PayID to get paid fast. PayID can be a mobile number or email address

features.additionalInfo: Bonus interest is paid in any month when you deposit a minimum of $5 into your Young Saver account and make no withdrawals.

features.additionalValue: Easy access to your account 24/7 with the People’s Choice Smartphone and iPhone App, Internet Banking and Phone Banking.
Visa Debit Card 'credit' transactions, EFTPOS purchases (without cash withdrawals), ATM withdrawals, BPAY payments, Cash Deposits, Internet and Phone Banking transfers.

features.additionalInfo: Ability to transact via our branch network

features.additionalValue: One to One Relationship Management available
features.additionalInfo: Our Program One to One provides a higher level of personalised service to members that have significant business with the Credit Union, measured by borrowings and/or deposits. This is achieved by providing each member with their own Relationship Manager as a single point of contact for all their financial service needs.

eligibility.additionalValue: Permanent residents of Australia who reside in Australia at the time of membership application are eligible for membership, regardless of citizenship status.

fees.name: Direct Debits
fees.additionalInfo: First Direct Debit is free per month

fees.name: Branch withdrawals & Branch transfers
fees.additionalInfo: First Branch withdrawal or Branch debit transfer is free per month

fees.name: Statement Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applied when we are unable to send an email to your elected email address for three consecutive months notifying you that your eStatement is available.

fees.name: Auto Transfer Order Rejection
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when your account has insufficient funds to cover a payment.

fees.name: Electronic Auto Transfer Order
fees.additionalInfo: Applies for each staff assisted external electronic payment debited from your account.

fees.name: BPAY - Rejected Future Dated Payments
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when your account has insufficient funds to cover a payment.

fees.name: Corporate Cheque
fees.additionalInfo: Charged each time a Corporate Cheque is issued.

fees.name: Direct Debit Dishonour
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when your account has insufficient funds to cover the amount of a direct debit. Charged on the day the direct debit is attempted. Not charged if Honour Fee is payable.

fees.name: Others
fees.additionalInfo: All People's Choice Credit Union Fees and Charges are referenced within the disclosure document linked below.

depositRates.additionalValue: Base rate - applies to full balance at the end of each day.
Bonus interest is paid in any month when you deposit a minimum of $5 into your Young Saver account and make no withdrawals.
depositRates.additionalInfo: Any withdrawal from the account will result in the loss of all bonus interest for the calendar month in which the withdrawal is made.
